text: Demiromanticism is a romantic orientation. It's considered to be in the gray area of aromanticism. A demiromantic person can have romantic attraction after an emotional bond. It's related to demisexuality. Demiromantic people can have any sexual orientation. The term was created in asexual communities, such as Asexual Visibility and Education Network. == References == Category:Aromanticity
title: Demiromanticism
